content.raw:
In gazebo 1.4, we renamed the manifest.xml's for gazebo models to model.config. Any new models added to the database since then have not had manifest.xml's added. If you don't want to upgrade to a newer version of gazebo, as a workaround you can rename the model.config in your `~/.gazebo/models/lamp_post/` folder to manifest.xml, for each of the models that give you this problem.

I see errors like this for the construction_cone, construction_barrel, kitchen_dining, and lamp_post in the code you pasted above.
content.html:
In gazebo 1.4, we renamed the manifest.xml's for gazebo models to model.config. Any new models added to the database since then have not had manifest.xml's added. If you don't want to upgrade to a newer version of gazebo, as a workaround you can rename the model.config in your ~/.gazebo/models/lamp_post/ folder to manifest.xml, for each of the models that give you this problem.

I see errors like this for the construction_cone, construction_barrel, kitchen_dining, and lamp_post in the code you pasted above.
